component.name: Self Review
component.summary: Local-only PR review UI for git diffs

description.p: A desktop app that provides a GitHub-style pull request review interface for local git diffs and directory-based reviews. Designed for solo developers reviewing AI-generated code. Features include split and unified diff views, inline comments with markdown support, code suggestions, syntax highlighting, and XML export of review feedback.
Added Flatpak packaging and desktop integration files.
